title: Button, ca. 1890
description:
-a is NY State National Guard button; -c and -d  are Seventh Regiment, Veterans Corp buttons.
Brass buttons; circular, convex. -a showing eagle bearing shield, ribbon with the letters N.Y.S.A. surrounded by the words: Excelsior National Guard; on reverse: D. Evans & Co. Attleboro; -c and -d showing numeral 7 between V and C surrounded by a wreath; on reverse; Waterbury Button Co. Waterbury Con.

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. brass. Gift of  Elisha Dyer. 1940-1-1-a,c,d.
